metadata.title: CVE-2022-21295 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). The supported version that is affected is Prior to6.1.32. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attackerwith logon to the infrastructure where Oracle VM VirtualBox executes tocompromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. While the vulnerability is in Oracle VMVirtualBox, attacks may significantly impact additional products.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized readaccess to a subset of Oracle VM VirtualBox accessible data. Note: Thisvulnerability applies to Windows systems only. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 3.8(Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
